fqaQuestion: Which file formats can I upload?
fqaAnswer: Our application supports various audio formats such as WAV, FLAC, among others.
fqaQuestion2: How long does the mastering process take?
fqaAnswer2: The duration varies depending on the length and complexity of the song, but it generally takes only a few minutes to complete.
fqaQuestion3: How good will the results be with AI mastering?
fqaAnswer3: AI mastering optimizes the results based on the characteristics of the reference tracks. Better quality reference tracks lead to better results.
fqaQuestion4: What type of reference files can I use?
fqaAnswer4: You can use reference files that have been professionally mastered and have a similar sound quality to the desired outcome.
fqaAnswer5: Secure payment methods such as credit card are accepted.
fqaQuestion6: What is the difference between the Free plan and the Pro plan?
fqaAnswer6: Users on the Free plan can try out the application unlimitedly but cannot download the results. Pro plan users, on the other hand, can download the results and access more advanced features.
fqaQuestion7: What can I do if I'm not satisfied?
fqaAnswer7: Customer satisfaction is important to us. If you are not satisfied with the results or encounter any issues, you can contact our support team at help@veeq.io to resolve your concerns.
